Evaluation_Questions: How well did this course, to the extent promised in the syllabus, enable “conversation across lines of difference,” integrate practical and theoretical concerns, or consider and integrate issues of class, gender/sexuality, race/ethnicity, dis/ability, and or global/cultural diversity
Comments_Questions: What was the name of your practicum instructor
What were her/his strengths or weaknesses
Comments_List: Rev. Burnett was a wonderful resource in the course. She is so warm, and she was a welcoming complement to Professor Moschella. She understood the workings of the prison because of her position at York, and she was able to make everything feel comfortable and enjoyable. I was so uplifted by her presence at every class meeting.
Rev. Burnett likewise wanted to be a part of this course experience and was professional/attentive.
She was insightful, strong and welcoming.
